General.Name: Sporting Clube de Portugal - Futebol SAD
General.Description: Sporting Clube de Portugal - Futebol, SAD operates sports clubs in Portugal. The company also engages in the sale of tickets for games; advertising and sponsorships activities; and provision of television rights. Sporting Clube de Portugal - Futebol, SAD was founded in 1907 and is headquartered in Lisbon, Portugal.
